channel.title: R Markdown on Dinesh's Election Blog
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on Dinesh's Election Blog

item.title: Blog #1
item.description:
A look at the competitiveness of presidential election and predicting 2024’s election outcome.

Introduction

Let’s think about a few questions to start off: 1. How has the competitiveness of presidential races changed over the years? 2. Which states are reliable red or blue strongholds, and which ones keep us guessing? 3. Can we use past election data to get a sneak peek at what might unfold in the 2024 Presidential Election?
